text: On World Social Media Day, the @UN asks you to please PAUSE ✋ and #takecarebeforyoushare information about #COVID19 on social media and with your friends & family📱🚨 Consider the 5 W’s before sharing, it could save lives! https://t.co/YJmV6CNes4

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis

domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands
